title: gardeniacrt
author: gardeniacrt
content: Hello!As i decided to stop gambling, i want to sell my stake.com Platinum III Account. Current progress to Platinum IV: 18% Minimum monthly bonus: 40 USD (even you do not play)Wagered amount so far: Around 1m USDSo if you buy it, and even you do not play, you will have 40 USD guaranteed income each month.Price is 250 USDif interested, please let me know.NOTE: I do not recommend gambling, but if you still want to play, it's a good opportunity to buy my account as it offers more and more cash bonuses as you play.
